articles.title: Square Enix denies takeover rumors - Engadget
articles.description: Square Enix has denied reports that it is being targeted by multiple buyers for a potential takeover.
articles.content: A spate of recent game studio acquisitions has left many guessing who will be next. Well, it probably won't be Square Enix. The Japanese studio has rebuffedreportsclaiming it was being circled by mul… [+1783 chars]

articles.author: Mark Wilson
articles.title: It's official: DJI is moving into self-driving cars - TechRadar
articles.description: The rumored DJI Automotive sub-brand is real
articles.content:
DJI has just upstaged the launch of its own DJI Air 2S drone by announcing a new sub-brand called DJI Automotive the new home for its self-driving car tech.
Rumors earlier in the week had suggested … [+2904 chars]

articles.author: Nick Farrell
articles.title: AMD releases Ryzen 5 3500X - Fudzilla
articles.description: At a stupid price AMD's Ryzen 5 3500X, which has been only on sale in China is being flogged at a ridiculous price as a retail chip in several online American stores.
articles.content:
On Amazon, you can find the 3500X going for $219.99 and on Newegg.com it is selling for $173.99.
Amazons price of $219.99 makes a more competitive processor from Intel's mid-range Comet Lake and Roc… [+997 chars]
